panels.description: The RAM usage of the replica process.
panels.title: Replica resident memory

panels.description: The RSS of all sandbox processes
panels.title: Sandbox resident memory

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  sum by(status_, request_type, type) (
    label_replace(
      rate(replica_http_request_duration_seconds_count{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]),
      "status_", "$1", "status", "([0-9]{3}).*"
    )
  ),
  "request_type", "", "request_type", "unknown")

panels.description:
Running replicas.

Replica restarts are indicated by white bars. A zero value not ending in a white bar indicates a failure to collect metrics rather than a restart.
panels.title: Running Replicas

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
    quantile by(ic, ic_subnet) (
      0.5,
      predict_linear(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{job="replica",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[30s], 0)
    )
  - on(ic, ic_subnet) group_right
    predict_linear(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{job="replica",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[30s], 0),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

panels.description: Mean difference (over $period) between notarization and finalization max height, validated (green) and unvalidated (red).
panels.title: Notarization -> Finalization Latency

panels.description: Height below which replicated states are purged, per instance.
panels.title: Replicated State Purge Height

panels.description: Mean difference (over $period) between notarization share and finalization max height, validated (green) and unvalidated (red).
panels.title: Notarization Share -> Notarization Latency

panels.description: Mean difference (over $period) betweenv alidated (green) and unvalidated (blue) finalization and certification max height.
panels.title: Finalization -> Certification Latency

panels.description: Number of artifacts in the unvalidated ingress pool.
panels.title: Unvalidated Ingress Pool Artifacts

panels.description: Validated ingress pool artifact size in bytes.
panels.title: Validated Ingress Pool Bytes

panels.description: Number of artifacts in the validated Ingress pool, averaged over **$period** (configurable).
panels.title: Validated Ingress Pool Artifacts

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  avg by (ic, ic_subnet, instance, status) (
    (
      (increase(state_sync_duration_seconds_sum{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]) > 0)
    /
      (increase(state_sync_duration_seconds_count{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]) > 0)
    )
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([0-9a-z]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1...$2", "instance", "\\[((?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:\\]]+)\\]?:[0-9]+")

panels.title: Rate of ingress messages gossiped vs delivered
